name: The Building (WunderDev)
description: The Building is a survival type game where you have to press 8 buttons before you can try to escape. This may seem boring, but there are most certainly a lot of twists! There are different characters who try to help you or prevent you from leaving and/or pressing the buttons. The main enemy, "Pesibo", is somehow linked to the buttons. Every button you press causes him more pain, but with nothing else to do, why not just see what happens? Oh and one more thing, the game does not force you to press the buttons, you can choose to spare Pesibo of pain, or let your curiosity take over...
